name: CF7 Shortcode Finder
author: Hardik Kalathiya

sections.description:
This plugin is compatible with Contact form 7 and it will help you to locate which form is placed on which page. This will be helpful in tracking down when your site has multiple forms. Just install our plugin and see the charm ðŸ™‚

Our field builder allows you to quickly and easily add fields to WP edit screens with only the click of a few buttons!

Fields can be added all over WP including posts, users, taxonomy terms, media, comments and even custom options pages!

Load and display your custom field values in any theme template file with our hassle free developer friendly functions!
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for “CF7 Shortcode Finder”
  3. Activate CF7 Shortcode Finder from your Plugins page
  4. Click under the contact tab click on “Shortcode Pages” and see the shortcode used on which pages!
sections.faq:
What kind of support do you provide?

Plugin can display the list of pages and widget on which CF7 shorcode placed, user can easily track the page and widget link.
